      • authenticate

        @Deprecated
public boolean authenticate(java.lang.String usernameString)
                                 throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        Deprecated. 
        authenticate is called when the user needs to login. Checks to see if the username the user entered is valid. It throws an exception when the username is wrong. Authenticate also sets the loggedInUser upon successful login.
        Parameters:
        usernameString - The username the user attempts to login with
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - Happens when the user enters a username with a username that does not exist.
        Since:
        Saturday October 15th, 2016
        See Also:
        LoginActivity

      • reset

        resets the UserController. Primarily used for testing.
